nodes.documentation: @title Contract for storing the current logic-contracts-addresses for the certificate of origin
nodes.name: AssetLogic

nodes.documentation:
@notice Constructor
 @param _cooContract The address of the coo contract
nodes.name: AssetLogic

nodes.documentation: @notice function to create a new empty asset, triggers event with created AssetID. To actually create an Asset the functions initGeneral and initLocations have to be called
nodes.name: createAsset

nodes.documentation:
@notice function toinizialize the database, can only be called once
 @param _dbAddress address of the database contract
nodes.name: init
initLocation
setActive

nodes.documentation:
@notice Updates the logic contract
 @param _newLogic Address of the new logic contract
nodes.name: update
getActive
getLastSmartMeterReadFileHash
getAssetListLength
getAssetLocation
updateSmartMeter
updateAssetExistStatus
